!path target/cws-fitnesse.jar
!define TEST_SYSTEM {slim}

# Return Codes
!define SUCCESS {200}

!define AUTHENTICATION_WARNING { 403 }
!define IDENTIFICATION_WARNING { 404 }
!define ILLEGAL_ACTION         { 405 }
!define VERIFICATION_WARNING   { 406 }
!define INTEGRITY_WARNING      { 409 }

|Import                 |
|io.javadog.cws.fitnesse|

!|script |control cws                           |
|set type|SOAP|and url|http://localhost:8080/cws|
|remove circles                                 |
|remove members                                 |
|remove data types                              |
